pages.text: To create tofu block, first you need to toss a crude salt into $(em)source block of soy milk$(), and then wait until it solidifies. Alternatively, you can use vinegar to mix with $(em)source block of soy milk$() to get tofu block, similar to how lava turns into obsidian.$(br2)Although tofu block is not as bouncy as slime block, walking on tofu won't slow you down. Tofu block can cancel falling
damage if you accidentally fall on it. $(br)Breaking tofu block will drop 3 - 4 tofu unless using $(em)Slik Touch$().
